thread.section_title: Kiwi Drug Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Kiwi Drug | kiwidrug.com
thread.title: Chris Hamilton
thread.title_full: Kiwi Drug reviewed by Chris Hamilton

author: Chris Hamilton
title: Chris Hamilton
text: I have been dealing with Kiwi Drugs for the past several years. Their communication is great and their products are of great quality. I live in Canada and have had great success ordering all the way from New Zealand! I had a shipping issue one time only... and it was most definitely not Kiwi Drugs fault. They were more than willing to reship the order and make it right, even though I don't think they had to! Kiwi Drugs is a great company and I look forward to doing business with them for many years to come! Thanks KiwiDrug.com!
